#段位服务器
platformconfig -a RankServerMap ddzh_test=65530,1;dbpy_test=65530,2;sdyi_test=65530,3;ddzh=65529,1;ddzh=65528,1;ddzh=65527,1;dbpy=65526,1;sdyi=65525,1;

#查询服务器
platformconfig -a QueryList 53000,53001,53002,53003,53004,53005,53006,53007,53008,53009,53010,53011,53012,53013,53014,53015,53016,53017,53018,53019,53020
 
#亲友圈
platformconfig -a Friend 65133,65134,65135,65138,65139,65140,65141,65142,65143,65144,65145,65146,65147,65148,65149,65150,65151,65152,65153,65154
